title: False Positive for Opiates
report: Yesterday night I ingested 8 ozs of robotussin. I came home, and my parents were extremaly worried becuase of my slurred speach and incoherance. So they took me to the emergency room. In the emergency room I was givin a urinalysis, which came up positive for OPIATES!!!!!

I raised hell. I never used opiates, and am a recovering mental marijuana addict, who is currently in rehab so don't smoke. I raised hell and was givin a blood anylsis, which is still pending, these results were extremaly devastating to me. In fact I could be put in in-patient rehab. My parents think I am a heroin user now.

erowid.citation: Aslanv. "False Positive for Opiates: experience with DXM & Drug Testing (ID 17821)". Erowid.org. Jun 22, 2007. erowid.org/exp/17821
